page.title: 05SMUGGLER'S RESTAURANT (cont)
page.content: with one full-time general assistant and my wife who does the cocktail bar work.During the morning the staff have to have everything cleaned and dusted, polished and filled.An average lunch is around 30 people,some eating from the set price Table D'Hote menu and some A La Carte.We tend to sell more white wine than red.The ordering of the wines,beers,minerals and spirites is done on Tuesday morning.All the time I have to look ahead to see if anything special has been ordered.The lunch customers leave by 3pm and I go straight to my office for 1\ hours to do the bookeeping.At 5pm,I have my main meal.By 6pm,I reopen the restaurant ready for start of service. Normally we would cater for 40 diners. At night,I put the takings into the safe,set the alarm,and go to bed around 1am.
